@--->curtnuggets: When they say spanish text, they are referring to the actual text in the movie. What they mean is that during the movie things written in text in the actual movie itself will be in Spanish even though the audio is English.

Secondly:

@---->backstreeetboy:
If your internet is slow, then pay for a faster fucking speed. Otherwise dont fucking bitch.
